channel.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
channel.description:
Yeah the title is pretty self-explanatory.
What would you rather live in if you actually had to choose the end of the World as we know it. Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse.
Just for fun :S

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:454415”][quote author=ggallin link=topic=557283.msg4082720#msg4082720 date=1345502463]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=557283.msg4082701#msg4082701 date=1345501754]

at a church i was visiting one of the leaders decided a good ice breaker question would be to ask ‘how many children zombies could you kill if you were in an enclosed room with no way out and you had a dull lead pipe for a weapon’ 0.0 sooooo, how many?
[/quote]you don’t need to kill them. Just get high in the air somehow. Zombies generally can’t climb well

hmm, perhaps it was a room with nothing to climb on?
[/quote]l2float you have a wand use it!(inb4pervs -.- )[/quote]
Suicide?

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I’d choose aliens cause they’d kill us nice and fast. Zombies would hurt.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I’d choose zombies because if aliens are smart enough to make it to Earth, they probably could just blow us up. With zombies I’d just climb up a ladder and the knock it down so they can’t reach me.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

zombies theyd be easier

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

In reality aliens don’t exist (im sure, i know this as fact, because i’m just that knowledgeable). A zombie apocalypse is actually happening as we speak. All you have to do is take out a mcdonalds bag in africa.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

I mean, majority of us would be part of the zombie apocalypse if one ever did happen. I’d probably have to go with alien.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @ASDss ASDss
item.description:
@ASDss wrote:

If I were to die in this situation, I’d rather take chances by getting like blasted by a alien then getting eaten or torn apart by a zombie.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse or alien Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

Zombies of course. If there were aliens we probably would be destroyed.

Read full topic

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Played enough Resident Evil/DayZ to know what to expect for zombies. Plus hell, zombie apoc would be a blast.
